title: Microsoft denies data breach, theft of 30 million customer accounts
description: Microsoft has denied the claims of the so-called hacktivists "Anonymous Sudan" that they breached the company's servers and stole credentials for 30 million customer accounts. [...]

title: Hackers target European government entities in SmugX campaign
description: A phishing campaign that security researchers named SmugX and attributed to a Chinese threat actor has been targeting embassies and foreign affairs ministries in the UK, France, Sweden, Ukraine, Czech, Hungary, and Slovakia, since December 2022. [...]

title: Microsoft Edge upgrades built-in Cloudflare VPN with 5GB of data
description: Microsoft's Edge browser has recently enhanced its 'Edge Secure Network' feature, which now offers 5GB of data, significantly increasing from the previously offered 1GB. [...]

title: 300,000+ Fortinet firewalls vulnerable to critical FortiOS RCE bug
description: Hundreds of thousands of FortiGate firewalls are vulnerable to a critical security issue identified as CVE-2023-27997, almost a month after Fortinet released an update that addresses the problem. [...]
